snippet: The revolution’s leading slogan, “Death to America,” is becoming a political battleground as a new president steers the country away from a confrontational posture toward the West.
abstract: Iran's leading revolutionary slogan, 'Death to America,' is becoming a political battleground as Pres Hassan Rouhani steers country away from confrontational posture toward the West; move inevitably calls into question the bedrock anti-American ideology of the Islamic republic.
lead_paragraph: The revolution’s leading slogan, “Death to America,” is becoming a political battleground as a new president steers the country away from a confrontational posture toward the West.

headline.main: As Iran Shifts, Hard-Liners See Threat to Battle Cry
headline.print_headline: As Iran Shifts, Hard-Liners See Threat To Battle Cry
